<S ssid="1" sid="4">In this paper, we present a new approach to mining new word translations from comparable corpora, by using context information to complement transliteration information.</S><S ssid="1" sid="14">When translating a word w, two sources of information can be used to determine its translation: the word w itself and the surrounding words in the neighborhood (i.e., the context) of w.
